pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implements Generic Composite Similarity Measure // Provides implementation of the generic composite similarity measure (GCSM) described in Liu et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.ecoinf.2020.101169. The implementation is in C++ and uses 'RcppArmadillo'. Additionally, implementations of the structural similarity (SSIM) and the composite similarity measure based on means, standard deviations, and correlation coefficient (CMSC), are included.
